mapper.select:
select sum(T.PLANFEE) SUMPLANFEE FROM t_performance_commplan T where T.ITEMATTRIBUTE IN ('0','3','6','4') AND T.WITHDRAWALSFLAG ='0' AND (T.PACKNO IS NULL or T.PACKNO='') AND T.AGENTCODE = #{agentCode}
AND T.ITEMATTRIBUTE IN ('0','3','6') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t_performance_branchagent_config B WHERE T.BRANCHCODE = B.BRANCHCODE AND T.AGENTORIGIN = B.AGENTORIGIN AND B.STATUS='1')

SELECT ifnull(SUM(IFNULL(B.BILLFEE,0)),0) sumBillFee, ifnull(SUM(IFNULL(B.BILLFEE,0)),0)-ifnull(SUM(IFNULL(B.BILLNETFEE,0)),0) sumBillTax, ifnull(SUM(CASE WHEN B.PAYREFFLAG='1' THEN IFNULL(B.BILLNETFEE,0) ELSE 0 END),0) sumAccountFee FROM (SELECT DISTINCT S.BILLNO FROM t_performance_commplan S WHERE AGENTCODE = #{agentCode} AND PACKNO IS NOT NULL
AND PACKAGEDATE >= str_to_date(#{startDay},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND PACKAGEDATE < DATE_ADD(str_to_date(#{endDay},'%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
) P,t_performance_paymentbill B WHERE P.BILLNO = B.PAYREFNO

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(BILLFEE,0)) sumBillFee, SUM(IFNULL(BILLFEE,0))-SUM(IFNULL(BILLNETFEE,0)) sumBillTax, SUM(CASE WHEN PAYREFFLAG='1' THEN IFNULL(BILLNETFEE,0) ELSE 0 END) sumAccountFee FROM t_performance_paymentbill WHERE AGENTCODE = #{agentCode} AND ITEMSTATUS IN ('1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6') AND PACKAGEDATE >= str_to_date(#{startDay},'%Y-%m-%d') AND PACKAGEDATE < DATE_ADD(str_to_date(#{endDay},'%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 1 DAY)

SELECT * from ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.CERTIID CERTIID_F,T.* FROM t_performance_commplan T where T.ITEMATTRIBUTE IN ('0','3','6') AND T.WITHDRAWALSFLAG ='0' AND (T.PACKNO IS NULL or T.PACKNO='') AND T.AGENTCODE = #{agentCode} AND T.PLANFEE<0 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t_performance_branchagent_config B WHERE T.BRANCHCODE = B.BRANCHCODE AND T.AGENTORIGIN = B.AGENTORIGIN AND B.STATUS='1')ORDER BY T.CERTIID) t UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.CERTIID CERTIID_F,T.* FROM t_performance_commplan T where T.ITEMATTRIBUTE IN ('0','3','6') AND T.WITHDRAWALSFLAG ='0' AND (T.PACKNO IS NULL or T.PACKNO='') AND T.AGENTCODE = #{agentCode} AND T.PLANFEE>0 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t_performance_branchagent_config B WHERE T.BRANCHCODE = B.BRANCHCODE AND T.AGENTORIGIN = B.AGENTORIGIN AND B.STATUS='1')ORDER BY T.CERTIID) t UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '' CERTIID_F,T.* FROM t_performance_commplan T where T.ITEMATTRIBUTE IN ('0','3','6') AND T.WITHDRAWALSFLAG ='0' AND (T.PACKNO IS NULL or T.PACKNO='') AND T.AGENTCODE = #{agentCode} AND T.PLANFEE<>0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t_performance_branchagent_config B WHERE T.BRANCHCODE = B.BRANCHCODE AND T.AGENTORIGIN = B.AGENTORIGIN AND B.STATUS='1')ORDER BY T.CERTIID) t UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '' CERTIID_F,T.* FROM t_performance_commplan T where T.ITEMATTRIBUTE = '4' AND T.WITHDRAWALSFLAG ='0' AND (T.PACKNO IS NULL or T.PACKNO='') AND T.AGENTCODE = #{agentCode} AND T.PLANFEE<>0 ORDER BY T.CERTIID) t ) t
limit #{start}, #{pageSize}

SELECT IFNULL(sum(t.PLANFEE),0) from ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.CERTIID CERTIID_F,T.* FROM t_performance_commplan T where T.ITEMATTRIBUTE IN ('0','3','6') AND T.WITHDRAWALSFLAG ='0' AND (T.PACKNO IS NULL or T.PACKNO='') AND T.AGENTCODE = #{agentCode} AND T.PLANFEE<0 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t_performance_branchagent_config B WHERE T.BRANCHCODE = B.BRANCHCODE AND T.AGENTORIGIN = B.AGENTORIGIN AND B.STATUS='1')ORDER BY T.CERTIID) t UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.CERTIID CERTIID_F,T.* FROM t_performance_commplan T where T.ITEMATTRIBUTE IN ('0','3','6') AND T.WITHDRAWALSFLAG ='0' AND (T.PACKNO IS NULL or T.PACKNO='') AND T.AGENTCODE = #{agentCode} AND T.PLANFEE>0 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t_performance_branchagent_config B WHERE T.BRANCHCODE = B.BRANCHCODE AND T.AGENTORIGIN = B.AGENTORIGIN AND B.STATUS='1')ORDER BY T.CERTIID) t UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '' CERTIID_F,T.* FROM t_performance_commplan T where T.ITEMATTRIBUTE IN ('0','3','6') AND T.WITHDRAWALSFLAG ='0' AND (T.PACKNO IS NULL or T.PACKNO='') AND T.AGENTCODE = #{agentCode} AND T.PLANFEE<>0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t_performance_branchagent_config B WHERE T.BRANCHCODE = B.BRANCHCODE AND T.AGENTORIGIN = B.AGENTORIGIN AND B.STATUS='1')ORDER BY T.CERTIID) t ) t

insert.selectKey: select count(*) from t_performance_commplan where CERTIID = #{certiId}
insert.if:
update t_performance_commplan s
S.POLICYNO = #{policyNo},
S.CERTINO = #{certiNo},
S.AGENTCODE = #{agentCode},
S.RISKCNAME = #{riskCName},
S.REALPOLIFEE = #{realPoliFee},
S.DISRATE = #{disRate},
S.PLANFEE = #{planFee},
S.INSUREDNAME = #{insuredName},
S.ITEMATTRIBUTE = #{itemAttribute},
S.WITHDRAWALSFLAG = #{withdrawalsFlag},
S.WITHDRAWALSMSG = #{withdrawalsMsg},
S.WITHDRAWALSDATE = #{withdrawalsDate},
S.PACKNO = #{packNo},
S.UPDATEDATE = now(),
S.AGREEMENTNO = #{agreementNo},
S.AGENTORIGIN = #{agentOrigin},
S.BRANCHCODE = #{branchCode},
S.HANDLER1CODE = #{handler1code},
S.BILLSTATUS = #{billStatus},
S.PACKAGEDATE = #{packageDate},
S.CERTITYPE = #{certiType},
S.COMMISIONTYPE = #{commisionType},
S.RISKCODE = #{riskCode},
S.CONTRACTNO = #{contractno},
S.APPLICODE = #{appliCode},
S.APPLINAME = #{appliName},
S.INSUREDCODE = #{insuredCode},
S.STARTDATE = #{startDate},
S.ENDDATE = #{endDate},
S.UNDERWRITEDATE = #{underWriteDate},
S.VALIDDATE = #{validDate},
S.COMCODE = #{comCode},
S.MAKECOM = #{makeCom},
S.AGENTNAME = #{agentName},
S.HANDLER1NAME = #{handler1Name},
S.HANDLERCODE = #{handlerCode},
S.BUSINESSNATURE = #{businessNature},
S.SHAREHOLDERFLAG = #{shareholderFlag},
S.CARNATURECODE = #{carNatureCode},
S.WRITEOFFFLAG = #{writeOffFlag},
S.MAINPOLICYFLAG = #{mainPolicyFlag},
S.MAXDISRATE = #{maxDisRate},
S.ACCBOOKCODE = #{accBookCode},
S.PACKFLAG = #{packFlag},
S.PACKPRINTFEE = #{packPrintFee},
S.ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5},
S.HD1EXHIBITIONNO = #{hD1ExhibitionNo},
S.CERTIFICATENO = #{certifiCateNo},
S.PROJECTSERIALNO = #{proJectSerialNo},
S.BUSINESSNATURE2 = #{businessNature2},
S.BUSINESSNATURE2NAME = #{businessNature2Name},
S.HANDLER2CODE = #{handler2Code},
S.HANDLER2NAME = #{handler2Name},
S.BILLNO = #{billNo},
S.REIMNO = #{reimNo},
S.PAYINFOSTATUS = #{payInfoStatus},
S.CALLBACKFLAG = #{callBackFlag},
S.NEEDCALLBACK = #{needCallBack},
S.AGENCYCODE = #{agencyCode},
S.REALPREMIUM = #{realPremium},
S.AUDITDATE = #{auditDate},
S.CLASSCODE = #{classCode}
CERTIID = #{certiId}

insert into t_performance_commplan ( CERTIID, POLICYNO, CERTINO, AGENTCODE, RISKCNAME, REALPOLIFEE, DISRATE, PLANFEE, INSUREDNAME, ITEMATTRIBUTE, WITHDRAWALSFLAG, WITHDRAWALSMSG, WITHDRAWALSDATE, PACKNO, UPDATEDATE, AGREEMENTNO, AGENTORIGIN, BRANCHCODE, HANDLER1CODE, BILLSTATUS, PACKAGEDATE, CERTITYPE, COMMISIONTYPE, RISKCODE, CONTRACTNO, APPLICODE, APPLINAME, INSUREDCODE, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, UNDERWRITEDATE, VALIDDATE, COMCODE, MAKECOM, AGENTNAME, HANDLER1NAME, HANDLERCODE, BUSINESSNATURE, SHAREHOLDERFLAG, CARNATURECODE, WRITEOFFFLAG, MAINPOLICYFLAG, MAXDISRATE, ACCBOOKCODE, PACKFLAG, PACKPRINTFEE, ATTRIBUTE5, HD1EXHIBITIONNO, CERTIFICATENO, PROJECTSERIALNO, BUSINESSNATURE2, BUSINESSNATURE2NAME, HANDLER2CODE, HANDLER2NAME, BILLNO, REIMNO, PAYINFOSTATUS, CALLBACKFLAG, NEEDCALLBACK, AGENCYCODE, REALPREMIUM, AUDITDATE, CLASSCODE) VALUES( #{certiId}, #{policyNo}, #{certiNo}, #{agentCode}, #{riskCName}, #{realPoliFee}, #{disRate}, #{planFee}, #{insuredName}, #{itemAttribute}, #{withdrawalsFlag}, #{withdrawalsMsg}, #{withdrawalsDate}, #{packNo}, now(), #{agreementNo}, #{agentOrigin}, #{branchCode}, #{handler1code}, #{billStatus}, #{packageDate}, #{certiType}, #{commisionType}, #{riskCode}, #{contractno}, #{appliCode}, #{appliName}, #{insuredCode}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{underWriteDate}, #{validDate}, #{comCode}, #{makeCom}, #{agentName}, #{handler1Name}, #{handlerCode}, #{businessNature}, #{shareholderFlag}, #{carNatureCode}, #{writeOffFlag}, #{mainPolicyFlag}, #{maxDisRate}, #{accBookCode}, #{packFlag}, #{packPrintFee}, #{attribute5}, #{hD1ExhibitionNo}, #{certifiCateNo}, #{proJectSerialNo}, #{businessNature2}, #{businessNature2Name}, #{handler2Code}, #{handler2Name}, #{billNo}, #{reimNo}, #{payInfoStatus}, #{callBackFlag}, #{needCallBack}, #{agencyCode}, #{realPremium}, #{auditDate}, #{classCode})
